article_title: Ad Watch: Democrats use Obamacare against Ose
article_text: The House Majority PAC, a Democratic group, has criticized Republican congressional challenger Doug Ose for his stances on veterans and Social Security. Now, in a new television ad, the group is targeting the former congressman for his pledge to repeal the Affordable Care Act and replace it with a new plan.

article_metadata.news-keywords: adwatch, ad, truth, doug ose, ami bera, congress, congressional, obamacare

article_summary:
The House Majority PAC, a Democratic group, has criticized Republican congressional challenger Doug Ose for his stances on veterans and Social Security.
Now, in a new television ad, the group is targeting the former congressman for his pledge to repeal the Affordable Care Act and replace it with a new plan.
